heading: HR02282
0: RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING IYAH MINA FOR BEING THE FIRST TRANSGENDER BEST ACTRESS AWARDEE IN THE HISTORY OF PHILIPPINE CINEMA AND COMMENDING THE CREATORS, CAST, AND CREW OF "MAMU; AND A MOTHER TOO" LED BY DIRECTOR ROD SINGH FOR BRINGING GENUINE LGBTQ+ REPRESENTATION INTO FILM FOR THE APPRECIATION AND AWARENESS OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC INFORMATION since 2018-11-13
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02282
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING IYAH MINA FOR BEING THE FIRST TRANSGENDER BEST ACTRESS AWARDEE IN THE HISTORY OF PHILIPPINE CINEMA AND COMMENDING THE CREATORS, CAST, AND CREW OF "MAMU; AND A MOTHER TOO" LED BY DIRECTOR ROD SINGH FOR BRINGING GENUINE LGBTQ+ REPRESENTATION INTO FILM FOR THE APPRECIATION AND AWARENESS OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
